fullText: With all that groundbreaking, perhaps it is no surprise that the production is otherwise very conventional, sometimes dispiritingly so.
bwwExcerpt: Perhaps it’s enough that “How to Dance in Ohio” offers solace and encouragement in a mild, conventional package. (There are cool-down spaces for those who need them, as one of the actors explains in welcoming the audience.) Doing sweet, reparative work for any part of humanity means doing sweet, reparative work for it all.

keyPhrases.quote: otherwise very conventional, sometimes dispiritingly so
the production is otherwise very conventional

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review acknowledges some groundbreaking elements but emphasizes disappointment with the conventional nature of the overall production, suggesting a mixed-negative experience. | GPT-4o-mini: The review indicates a conventional production with a negative tone, suggesting a mixed recommendation.
